data.text: @storywrtr Oh no! Had some too but it ends then you’ll be better!

@storywrtr Oh that 3rd one killed me. I was sick for 5 days. Missed work.  Had a migraine for 10 days

I really hope the booster is only once a year
@ShellyinTexas That’s really cool. Sucks it has to end… but so cool you had it.
@ShellyinTexas Wow. Shit. 7? You brave soul, you. Well, you are definitely protected from the microscopic serial killers.
@storywrtr Ok I will! It’s been almost 2 months since my last shot. Probably time to get another. That will be 7 since Jan ‘21.

@storywrtr I was lucky to find the TxCares study. I got 3 free antibody tests in 3 month intervals. 3rd one was last month. I’m going to miss knowing how my vax is holding up. I hope you start feeling better soon.
@ShellyinTexas Pneumonia sucks! Get the vaccine! It’s a much easier to deal with than Covid, for sure.
@storywrtr CVS is recommending the pneumo vaccine for me too based on age and lack of history with that booster. I’m sure I’ll get it this year.
@ShellyinTexas Oh geez! Last thing I need. I was talked into a pneumonia shot because my asthma is off the charts… I’ll check into that shot as well. Thanks for the heads up.

@ShellyinTexas Oh no… that was the same last night. Super high fever, 103.5°, and the swelling was painful, and today I feel like I’ve been run over by a Mother Trucker. Bleh.  I’m not sure when or how to see if my immune system is going. It’s cool that you know your stats.
